name: Gunzio Computer Version
description:
You move with the Joystick on the screen, and Fire by clicking on the right side. Your league depends on your XP level. You gain points by killing the AI and surviving. If you go into the shop, you can purchase new skins and XP. 

Here is a link to the game on Unity Play. USE THIS LINK IF ONLINE PLAYER IS NOT WORKING

https://play.unity.com/mg/other/gunzio-computer-version

here is the link to the Mobile Version

https://jbrosdev.itch.io/gunzio-mobile
